intro: Psychotria lucens var. minor, commonly known as the lesser psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil, and thrives in humid, shaded environments. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale pink flowers. It is often found in understory habitats of tropical forests. Due to its ornamental value and potential medicinal properties, it is sometimes cultivated in botanical gardens and research settings.
